name: Bandel Battalion
description:
Not long after Indonesia's independence, the Dutch tried to regain control of the country by sending in armed forces to Batavia (Now called Jakarta) with British assistance in September 1945. To protect their freedom and their country, Indonesian people would need every available manpower to face the Dutch army.

Thus, you are chosen, unfortunately, to lead a team of nationalistic criminal underdogs; thugs, convicts, thieves, and the likes. Your army is expected to win against military-trained, battle-tested Dutch soldiers.

How to play:

  • Memorize enemy movements;
  • Deploy your units by dragging the cards quickly to the edge of the battleground; You only have 5 seconds.
  • Watch your units' steps and attack line. Unit's steps are randomized, so place your units wisely (e.g. 3 steps means that your unit will attack when an enemy reaches his 3rd step).

This game is made for and submitted to the Historically Accurate Game Jam 5. Consider rating the game if you like it.
